<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>printRecipientName</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(/* GlideRecord */ current, /* TemplatePrinter */ template,
          /* Optional EmailOutbound */ email, /* Optional GlideRecord */ email_action,
          /* Optional GlideRecord */ event) {
		var user = gs.getUserDisplayName();
		template.print(user);
          // Add your code here

})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-16 13:41:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>143e1521476231107b748a5f746d43ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>printRecipientName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_143e1521476231107b748a5f746d43ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-16 13:41:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
